name: Hexes and Hearth
description:
You are a witch running a store. It's up to you to fulfill your somewhat peculiar patrons' orders for the Autumn Season, and maybe grow a little bit along the way.

This is a very light puzzle game that requires you to guess what kind of item best fulfills your patrons' requests. Don't worry, if you don't quite get it right the first time, you can try again as many times as you like. 

Use the arrow keys (or WASD) to move, and space to interact with objects in the world.

This was a submission for the 2022 Cozy Autumn Game Jam.
